text: Polyalthia rufescens is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is native to Kerala and Tamil Nadu in India. It is threatened by habitat loss.World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Polyalthia rufescens. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. ==References== rufescens Category:Flora of Kerala Category:Flora of Tamil Nadu Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
